channel.title: Here's How I See Servers Going
channel.description:
This is just a fun little prediction I have, and I'm curious to think what you think will happen to servers in the future (by servers I obviously mean RuneScape private servers). This does not include any of the newer like 6xx+ stuff.
-Soon there will be a bunch of playable RuneScape remakes. There's already Davidi2's and I believe a couple others, and there are some promising ones in the development section as well. -Afterwards, when people can't decide which ones to play and get sick of the slow leveling, the style goes back to either the original popular wL servers like CheezScape or the DeltaScape age. -People soon get bored of all the game's original content, and soon the expectancy is to have custom maps, NPCs, items, and the sort. -Remakes start for the higher revisions -317 servers/clients become obsolete
What do you think?
~Lin

item.title: Here's How I See Servers Going

item.description:

317 wont ever become obsolete.
[/quote]
exactly, as long as I’m here[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Here's How I See Servers Going
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:49, topic:473074”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=590971.msg4193362#msg4193362 date=1357155552]

530 was shit though, nobody would play a 530…

Lol how? 530 was a great revision, not as solid as 317 of course, but still great.

do you see any 530 servers right now?

possibly, but very very very few.

that was when runescape was realllllly shitty.
[/quote]The only reason people don’t use 530 or any other random 500 is because other revisions are simply more developed. That’s it. I believe 508 is the most used because it was the most complete cache we had during that time.[/quote]

well yeah, that too.

my point is nobody is going to do a 530 remake, and if they do it would be retarded(and never completed)

Read full topic

item.title: Here's How I See Servers Going
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Supah Flyizzle:

i said that maybe the first link that was posted used a packet that would normally be used for something like construction since it’s just a loveing flat plane.

The construct map region packet doesn’t magically make the map chunk flat, IF he did use that packet(which he didnt) it would look like the map normally does, and when you spawn another chunk next to it, they form together like so

custom map index:

However the above isn’t using the construct map region packet, it’s a custom map index, but it’s just about the same concept.

packet:

item.title: Here's How I See Servers Going
item.dc:creator: @Supah_Flyizzle Supah Flyizzle
item.description:
@Supah_Flyizzle wrote:

gravenfire23:

You’re a loveing idiot… I myself have used peters map editor although difficult to use its completely possible. And there is no packet to edit maps in a 317 client i don’t know where you’re getting this information but obviously you’ve been misinformed.

clearly you’ve been misinformed because that’s not even remotely close to what i’ve been fucking saying in the first place. i didn’t say there was a “packet to edit maps.” i said that maybe the first link that was posted used a packet that would normally be used for something like construction since it’s just a fucking flat plane.

the main thing the wanker clawz was starting a fight about was the fact that the other guy said that it’s a great map editor and then went on to contradict it. that’s it. further backed up by the fact that it’s not usable enough to the point where everyone can actually use it. i’m not saying nothing has ever been made with it, i’m saying that just about nothing has been made with it. if the map editor’s greatness is defined by the content that can be created in it then by that standard it’s not great either.

i’m done with this thread, full of bloody morons who can’t understand simple logic and people who get all excited at the prospect of making themselves feel better about their existence by trying so hard to insult and prove other people wrong and put words in the other person’s mouth to make their nonsense argument better in their eyes.

Read full topic
item.source: Here's How I See Servers Going

item.title: Here's How I See Servers Going
item.dc:creator: @Supah_Flyizzle Supah Flyizzle
item.description:
@Supah_Flyizzle wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:30, topic:473074”][quote author=Supah Flyizzle link=topic=590971.msg4184867#msg4184867 date=1356014749]

i don’t think anything has ever been made with that specific editor because it’s pretty much unusable. i don’t know of many servers with their own entirely custom made maps or even slightly modified maps through anything but hard coding into the client or packing newer revision maps.

I have. There are some that have been released, actually.

where?

There’s been one or two released here I think and I’ve played I think four servers that have made custom areas.

well i looked and i couldn’t find anything on your created topics list. also the “played four servers” is kind of irrelevant because it has nothing to do with that specific map editor. probably just done through that packet is supposedly used for construction. all manual.
[/quote]lol a packet for construction in a 317 client… seems legit. Just to prove you wrong i took 2 seconds and found this in the download list http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514816.0.html

Tell me more about how he used the construction packet? Please just stop posting…

EDIT: Oh look heres another http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=490972.0[/quote]

nowhere does it say that they used peter’s editor, and that’s what we’re talking about. i claim that nobody has made anything in it because it’s pretty much unusable and as far as i can tell the first one is just a flat surface with a bunch of objects.

that could be done using that packet. i’m not saying that everyone uses it, i’m just trying to suggest that not everything is made by a “map editor” that everyone can use because if there was one then everyone would use it.

Read full topic
